Pre-Game Insights: India have won ten T20Is on the trot since losing to New Zealand at the T20 World Cup.
Sri Lanka have won three and lost 12 of the 16 T20Is they have played in India.
Chahal's 67 T20I wickets are now the most for India, overtaking Bumrah's 66 scalps.
Others: The match was played in Dharamsala, India on February 26, 2022.
The article was published on ESPNcricinfo.
